Title: Mabel
Writer: Vince Gilligan (created by), Peter Gould (created by), Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould
Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn, Patrick Fabian
Plot: As Chuck plots his next move, another lie comes back to haunt Jimmy. A rattled Mike tries to find out who's been tracking his movements - and how.
